title: Definitions: Annotation Collections.
description: Schemas in #/definitions detect or validate keys/objects (direct children) uniquely used to describe Annotation Collections (Section 5.1 and 5.2).

contextValueFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string included in Collection / Page description
contextValueFound.description: True when the string has value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 5)

contextValueInArrayFound.title: Definition: Valid @context string found in array included in Collection / Page description
contextValueInArrayFound.description: True when the array contains a string item having value http://www.w3.org/ns/anno.jsonld (Section 5)

annotationCollectionTypeValueRecognized.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type value string included in Collection description
annotationCollectionTypeValueRecognized.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)

annotationCollectionTypeValueInArrayReco.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationCollection type in array included in Collection description
annotationCollectionTypeValueInArrayReco.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationCollection' (Section 5.1)

annotationCollectionTypeValueFound.title: Implementation: AnnotationCollection type
annotationCollectionTypeValueFound.description: True when the Annotation Collection has type key and 'AnnotationCollection' is a value of type (Section 5.1)

annotationPageTypeValueRecognized.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type value string included in Page description
annotationPageTypeValueRecognized.description: True when the string has value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)

annotationPageTypeValueInArrayRecognized.title: Definition: Valid AnnotationPage type in array included in Page description
annotationPageTypeValueInArrayRecognized.description: True when the array contains a string item having value 'AnnotationPage' (Section 5.2)

annotationPageTypeValueFound.title: Implementation: AnnotationPage type
annotationPageTypeValueFound.description: True when the Annotation Page has type key and 'AnnotationPage' is a value of type (Section 5.2)

labelDefinition.title: Definition: label (Annotation Collections)
labelDefinition.description: True when the object has no label or has one or more label values of type string (Section 5.1)

labelFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection label
labelFound.description: True when the object has one or more label value(s) (Section 5.1)

totalDefinition.title: Definition: total (Annotation Collections)
totalDefinition.description: True when the object has no total key or has exactly one total value of type integer greater or equal to zero (Section 5.1)

totalFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection total key
totalFound.description: True when the object has exactly one total value (Section 5.1)

totalMoreThanZero.title: Definition: total more than zero (Annotation Collections)
totalMoreThanZero.description: True when the object has exactly one total value of type integer and greater than zero (Section 5.1)

firstValidIfPresent.title: Validation: first value (Annotation Collection)
firstValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no first key or has 1 first key value that is string of format uri or has first key value that is an object of type AnnotationPage (Section 5.1)

firstFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection first key
firstFound.description: True when the object has exactly one first value (Section 5.1)

firstRequiredIfTotalMoreThanZero.title: If total greater than zero, check for implementation of Annotation Collection first key
firstRequiredIfTotalMoreThanZero.description: True when the object has no total or has total = zero or has exactly one first value (Section 5.1)

lastValidIfPresent.title: Validation: last value (Annotation Collection)
lastValidIfPresent.description: True when the Annotation Collection has no last key or has 1 last key value that is string of format uri (Section 5.1)

lastFound.title: Check for implementation of Annotation Collection last key
lastFound.description: True when the object has exactly one last value that is string of format uri (Section 5.1)
